body_html: @aidan-plenert-macdonald — FWIW, we just added initial read/write support for Cloud Bigtable in TF 1.10.0, and you can store protocol buffers in Cloud Bigtable columns — in fact, you can store arbitrary bytes in Cloud Bigtable, since it doesn't enforce a typed schema. Hope this helps!
body_text: @aidan-plenert-macdonald — FWIW, we just added initial read/write support for Cloud Bigtable in TF 1.10.0, and you can store protocol buffers in Cloud Bigtable columns — in fact, you can store arbitrary bytes in Cloud Bigtable, since it doesn't enforce a typed schema. Hope this helps!
